Title: Merchant Id
Description: The current merchant token for the order

Title: Location Id
Description: The seller location that this order is associated with

Title: Sales Channel Id
Description: The sales channel associated with the order

Title: Created At
Description: The timestamp when the order was created

Title: Customer Id
Description: The customer associated with the order

Title: Category Name
Description: Name of the category of the item

Title: Channel Category
Description: High-level channel category (IN-STORE, ONLINE, INVOICE, OTHER)
